content:
Hi everyone!

Does the sa modifier for the date type search param (Encounter.period) implemented in hapi ?
https://hapi.fhir.org/baseR4/Encounter?date=sa2021-01-01
image.png

Thanks in advance!

Hello,
i have a question, why we need Quarkus for implementation with HAPI FHIR
HAPI FHIR is heavily based om Spring Core. Quarkus is not in scope currently, AFAIK
